column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service
Data source: National Livestock Reporting Service
Please see terms of use here: https://www.mla.com.au/general/Terms-and-conditions/data-and-information/

There was a larger yarding of 76 cattle at Powranna on Tuesday with a better lineup of yearlings and grown steers. This market was up to 30c dearer with yearling heifers making 312c to 334c while grown steers made 318c to 346c/kg.
The cow market was also much stronger with heavy beef cows making 306c to 330c, leaner 236c to 296c and very lean 140c to 216c/ kg live.

Market Reporter Richard Bailey
